questions.question: Choose the correct article: She wants to be ____ engineer.
Choose the correct option: ____ Amazon River is long.
Choose the best quantifier: There is ____ information to read.
Choose the best quantifier: ____ students were absent today.
Fill the gap: There are ____ cookies left; take one.
Choose the correct pair: ____ advice / ____ chairs
Fill in: She doesn't have ____ (much/many) time.
Fill in: There were ____ (few/a few) mistakes, but overall it was excellent.
Correct sentence:
options: Mount Fuji is a beautiful mountain.
The Mount Fuji is a beautiful mountain.
Mount Fuji is the beautiful mountain.

questions.question: Choose the best option: I don't have ____ money left.
Fill in: ____ people think grammar is boring, but not me. (many/much)
Which is correct with 'the'?
options: The biology I've studied is interesting.
questions.explanation: No article for subjects in general; article OK with modifier.
